name: Magnefly
description:
Player 1:

wad, q and e to magnetize.

Pplayer2:

arrows Right shift and numpad 1 to magnetize.

Made for the NEU CAMD Game Jam 2018 from 6:30pm 9/7 to 12:30pm 9/9.

Team:

ChengCheng Ding: Game Design

Clarence Hann: Game Implementation

Sidan Fan: Art and Special Effects

Winter Pu: Sound Effects and Map Editing
